title: Karma HD Watch Face
summary: Karma is a beauteous watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others smart watch
description: Model NumberDW-A20FCategoryDecentProduct description Karma Watch Face is an arresting watch face for all smart watches, a classy ideal sublime design makes it significant and definite (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features•	Ambient Mode•	Smooth Style Needle•	Tick Style NeedleAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: ✔ Ambient Mode✔ Smooth & Tick NeedlesConfiguration:  ✔ switch  between Tick & smooth needle style For Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Karma Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A20F

Category
Decent

Product description

Karma Watch Face is an arresting watch face for all smart watches, a classy ideal sublime design makes it significant and definite (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

• Ambient Mode
• Smooth Style Needle
• Tick Style Needle

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
✔ Ambient Mode
✔ Smooth & Tick Needles
Configuration:
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Karma Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Almost perfect Love how clear this watch face is. If there was one thing I would change it would be to have and option to display the day if the month too
Simple and elegant Just what I was looking for in a watch face, easy to read, and I love the smooth moving seconds hand.
Sucks Its sucks that you have to download the karma app
Looks amazing Sweeping second hand looks like a top end watch
Very Nice! Very well done. Thanks!
